alert.note: Alert for Hatteras Island; Northern Outer Banks (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued March 31 at 3:47PM EDT until April 02 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM SATURDAY TO 4 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level expected in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along the Soundside of the Outer Banks north of Buxton, including Avon, Rodanthe, Manteo, Nags Head, Kill Devil Hills, and Kitty Hawk. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...A Coastal Flood Advisory means that onshore winds and tides will combine to generate flooding of low areas along the shore. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Oregon Inlet NC MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.4 ft, Moderate 3.9 ft, Major 4.9 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 31/05 PM 1.4 0.8 1.0 2 None 01/07 AM 2.8 2.2 2.3 3 None 01/07 PM 3.4 2.8 2.9 3-4 Minor 02/07 PM 0.8 0.2 0.3 1 None 03/06 AM 0.8 0.2 0.4 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
